abstract: Editorial welcomes laws signed by Gov Jerry Brown of California promoting opportunities for immigrants, saying he has taken strong stance against intolerance and counterproductive policies being adopted in many other states across country.
snippet: Gov. Jerry Brown took a stand for immigrants’ rights and humane, sensible government when he signed several new bills into law.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jerry Brown took a stand for immigrants’ rights and humane, sensible government when he signed several new bills into law.
